Hessian Estimators¶

class pytorch_laplace.MSEHessianCalculator(**kwargs)¶

Mean Square Error

class pytorch_laplace.CEHessianCalculator(**kwargs)¶

Multi-Class Cross Entropy

class pytorch_laplace.BCEHessianCalculator(**kwargs)¶

Binary Cross Entropy

class pytorch_laplace.ContrastiveHessianCalculator(**kwargs)¶

Contrastive Loss

L(x,y) = 0.5 * || x - y || Contrastive(x, tuples) = sum_positives L(x,y) - sum_negatives L(x,y)

Notice that the contrastive loss value is the same for

self.method == “full”

and

self.method == “fix”
